import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SubcategoryTabs=_ref=>{let{activeCategory,activeSubcategory,onSubcategoryChange}=_ref;const subcategories=[{id:'pre-k-2',name:'Pre - K - 2'},{id:'grades-3-4',name:'Grades 3 - 4'},{id:'grades-5-8',name:'Grades 5 - 8'},{id:'high-school',name:'High School'}];// Get the color based on active category
const getCategoryColor=()=>{switch(activeCategory){case'workout-sports':return'#f7981e';case'dance-move':return'#4ECDC4';case'yoga':return'#96CEB4';case'mindfulness':return'#45B7D1';case'pre-school':return'#FFEAA7';case'k-12':return'#DDA0DD';default:return'#FF6B35';}};const categoryColor=getCategoryColor();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{position:'absolute',top:'100%',left:'0',zIndex:10,background:categoryColor,borderRadius:'15px',padding:'1rem',boxShadow:'0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)',minWidth:'250px',marginTop:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:'white',fontWeight:'bold',marginBottom:'0.5rem',fontSize:'0.9rem'},children:"5 Minute Videos"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',gap:'0.5rem'},children:subcategories.map(subcategory=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onSubcategoryChange(subcategory.id),style:{background:activeSubcategory===subcategory.id?'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)':'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7)',color:activeSubcategory===subcategory.id?'#333':'#555',border:'none',borderRadius:'20px',padding:'8px 16px',fontSize:'0.9rem',fontWeight:'600',cursor:'pointer',transition:'all 0.3s ease',textAlign:'center'},onMouseEnter:e=>{if(activeSubcategory!==subcategory.id){e.target.style.background='rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)';e.target.style.color='#333';}},onMouseLeave:e=>{if(activeSubcategory!==subcategory.id){e.target.style.background='rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7)';e.target.style.color='#555';}},children:subcategory.name},subcategory.id))})]});};export default SubcategoryTabs;
